column5: Were not talking hypothermia here. The topic of the day is hyp er thermia. We're not out of the humidity until a few more days, so for all OFC/OFC comrades and especially the fish-a-thon participants this weekend, I thought this would be a timely safety read;  http://chealth.canoe.ca/channel_condition_info_details.asp?disease_id=68&channel_id=44&relation_id=54611  Especially for the youngsters and us mature ones. Please read.  Thx, Grampa Slayer
Good tips I hope all the fish a thoners take advantage of the beach and cold water that has been donated.
Thanks Pikeslayer - great stuff for all of the Fish-A-Thon'ers who are going to be braving the heat tomorrow...  Cheers, Ryan
